class_notes: Music majors: This course counts as a elective credit
course_description: Prerequisite: Music 121 or permission of instructor. Theoretical and applied study of melodic patterns, chord types, and rhythmic patterns in the jazz idiom; development of aural and technical skills to create jazz styles spontaneously.
sections: Class Nbr: 3036, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: G. Motley, Status: Wait List
